videos.description: Saddiq Bey converts in the paint despite being fouled by Isaiah Roby.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saddiq Bey gets defender in the air for an and-1 bucket) 2022/04/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Saddiq Bey gets defender in the air for an and-1 bucket

videos.description: Cade Cunningham creates space with his handle and then knocks down a high-arcing jumper.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham splashes rainbow jumper) 2022/04/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham splashes rainbow jumper

videos.description: Isaiah Roby's pump fake gets two defenders in the air, leaving him open for an easy dunk.

videos.headline: Isaiah Roby displays great patience to slam it home

videos.description: Saben Lee dishes ahead to Killian Hayes for a powerful one-handed jam.

videos.description: Olivier Sarr elevates over Saben Lee for a big-time jam.
